name: Moon Invaders (BoBomann18, Rimaito)
description:
Moon Invaders

You as a brave astronaut have the duty to save the earth from an alien invasion.To win the war you have to gather intel on how they reproduce, so you can destroy the evil at its core. To survive you have to be connected to your base, it supplies you with oxygen and sometimes powerful tools to help you fight the aliens. So do your best  in getting the intel back to your Space-shuttle.

But keep in mind the tools don't leave you unaffected!

This is an entry for the GMTK-2021 Jam.

Controls:

Move - W, A, S, D

Fight - SPACE, LEFT MOUSE

Base Tools - R

Scan for Eggs - RIGHT MOUSE
